...The rain falls...
I'm so tired...
I want to sleep... forever...
What's the use of saving lives...
...Like love...
But I don't know love... I'm like a machine programmed to save other people's lives but never to have one of my own.
I have thousands of memories but none of them are mine... There is no need for me other than this. I'm immortal but I have no life.
Why?... Why would you need me?
Tell me...
Now you're allowed to kiss me.
Fuck you!
Fuck you!!
Yes, that's me.
We'll be right back ... we're gonna check out the duty free...
Tell Aknot plan A flopped.
But... 500 is all they need, sir.
1000! Fine, sir!
Father Cornelius?
Mr. Zorg would like a word with you.
Glad to help.
They just arrested the guy for Uranium smuggling. Everything's going as planned.
All I have to do now is to go to the airport and take his place.  I should be in Fhloston in less than four hours.
That's right.
That's impossible!  He's in j... I mean, there must be some mistake. I have my ticket!
I want to see your boss!  Get rid of this fucking window! Somebody's made a mistake, goddamnit!
Sorry, my fault... Just a little overexcited...
Yeah, it's me... Put Zorg on.
The real Korben Dallas is on the plane!
Aknot?  Is that you?
...What an ugly face! Doesn't suit you at all!
That's better! Never be ashamed of who you are...
So what if the Federal Army crushed your entire race and scattered your people to the wind...
...It's light... the handle's adjustable for easy carrying... good for righties and lefties.
... and replay sends every following shot to the same location...
I recharge, but the enemy has launched a cowardly sneak attack from behind, the automirror takes care of that.  Gives me the time to turn around and finish the job.
...Rocket launcher.  The always efficient flame thrower... My favorite.
...Four full crates, delivered right on time!
...Magnificent.
Alright..I've got an open mind here..
I'm fucked!
A case with four stones in it. Not one!
But you can still count.  Look...
...Four stones, four crates... Zero stones...
ZERO CRATES!!!
Put everything back, we're outta here.
So, you are a merchant, after all.
Leave them one crate.  For the cause!
I don't like warriors!  They're too narrow-minded, no sublety.  Worse, they fight for hopeless causes..for honor!
Bring the priest.
Zorg. Jean-Baptiste Emmanuel Zorg...
I'm glad you got your memory back, Father...
Personally, they are of no interest to me, I'd rather sell weapons..but I have a customer...
Why?  What's wrong with me?
Ah, Father... You are so wrong.
...would you like a drink?
Follow me.. Life, which you so nobly serve, comes from destruction. Look at this empty glass.
Here it is... peaceful... serene...
Destroyed...
...Look at all these little things...
Yes but... by that simple gesture of destruction.
Father, by creating a little destruction, I am, in fact, encouraging life!  So, in reality, you and I are in the same business!
Let me reassure you Father..I will never kill more people in my entire life than religion has killed in the last 2000 years.
You saved my life... So, I'm going to spare yours.
Throw him out!
I know...
...Torture whoever you want, the president if you have to but I want those Stones. You have an hour.
Don't come back without the Stones.
I'm listening.
This is a joke, right?
I cannot hear you. We have a bad connection here.  What's your number?
I'll call you back.
Yes... Zorg here.
No... not at all.  Where are you?
Really? Maybe I can get you on my screen and see you at last!
Got it.
Fine, just fine!  I'll have the 4 pieces you asked for any time now.  But it wasn't easy.
The Stones will be here. I'll see to it personally!
More than enough.
My compliments, little lady!
Nice knowing you.
You can run but you can't hide...
You want something done, do it yourself!
Nothing I can't fix myself.
Allow me...
Just for the fun of it.
Well, what do we have here? Is this Korben Dallas? The famous winner of the Gemini Croquette contest?
...In any event, whoever you are, I was glad to meet you.
...A 3000 round clip! I didn't fire off 3000 rounds... did I?
I didn't fire three thousand rounds...
Maximum Protection.
How's that? Can you hear me better now?
Who gives a shit! I didn't come here to listen to music! Listen up instead of running off at the mouth!
Dispatch me another ZFX200 immediately.
I'm not at the hotel!
Hello?...
Stay calm.... stay calm...
You asked for a case.
...We are warriors, not merchants!
We risked our lives. I believe a little compensation is in order.
Perfect... Take command, Akanit.
Not going to open?
How someone strong like you scared from a message? Is good news I sure!
You right that is bad.. but mathematically luck must change!
...You're fired. Oh!
Good philosophy..see good in bad..
Stewed jellyfish cake.. my speciality..
...We're working on it, Mr. President.
The thing is sending out radio wavelengths!
...Probably wants to make a call!
You're the nastiest dirtbag I know in this stinking City!
I've been playing twice a week for 20 years, 20 years I've been eating those shitty croquettes.
You wouldn't even eat one to help your poor mother, and you win the big prize?
Are you listening to me, you ingrate!
...And now you're making fun of me?
I get it! You want to make me beg, is that it?
You just won a trip, you dolt!
They've been blaring out your name on the radio for the last hour, blockhead!
Have you pulled yourself together?
You little sleaze bag!
Don't you ever ask me for another thing in my life again, you've killed your poor mother with your own hands!
Don't pull that crap with me, Finger...
Put your hands in the yellow circles, please.
Sir? Are you a human?
Sir, this is a control.  Please put your hands in the yellow circles.
Hey, who are you?
Uh... Sure, go ahead.
We're sending someone in who's authorized to negotiate.
I found him!
Replies.Didascalie: (at the other end of the hall)

Replies.Reply: Korben Dallas!  We got him.
It's showtime!
If it's war they want it's war they'll get!
Nobody move! We're taking over this ship!
What's the situation in the hall?
One more shot and we start killing hostages, got that?
Send someone to negotiate!
Congratulations on winning the contest.
Your wife?
Dallas... Korben...
Just a minute, please.
...Mr. Dallas... Korben Dallas?
The problem is I only have one Korben Dallas on my list... and he's already checked in.
I'm sorry, sir, boarding is finished.
The same?
You are so lucky... Loc Rhod is the coolest DJ in the universe.
Forget anonymous.  You'll be doing Loc Rhod's live show every day from 5 to 7!
Sweet dreams, Mr. Dallas!
No, no... I'm not ready! I'd like to talk first...
Ladies and gentlemen, we have begun our descent toward Fhloston Paradise...
I wanted to tell you that...
Korben Dallas! Here he is The most hated man in the universe. The one and only winner of the Gemini Croquette contest! Ladies, start melting 'cause the boy's hot! Hot! Hot! The boy is perfect..
...The right size, right build, right hair.  Right on!
Does it get any better or what!
...Quiver ladies, he's gonna set the world on fire right here from 5 to 7! You'll know everything there is to know about the D-man.
Freeze those knees, my chickadees, 'cause Korben is on the case with a major face...
...Start drooling, ladies! My man here is a sharp-tongued Sire who's gonna stroke your every desire.

Yesterday's unknown will be tomorrow's Prince of Fhloston Paradise, the hotel of a thousand and one follies, home of luxury and beauty.  A magic fountain flowing with non-stop wine, women and Bootchie Koochie Koo...
Beware out there puppy dogs my man is on the prowl. Owwww!

...And start licking your stamps little girls, this guy's gonna have you writing home to Momma! Tomorrow from 5 to 7, I'll be your voice, your tongue and I'll be hot on the tail of the sexiest man of the year... D-man...

Korben sweetheart do me a favor I know this is probably the biggest thing that ever happened to you in your inconsequential life. But I've got a show to do here and it's got to pop. So tomorrow, when we're on air, give me a hand... Try to make believe you have more than a one word vocabulary.
Crystal.
I don't want an individual position, I want all positions!
Now you're talking!
No!! I swear to God! I've never been this sincere with a human before!
My main man! Please don't leave me here alone. My head's killing me and my adoring fans are gonna tear me apart! Get me outta here!
Oh, yes! Do that! You treat me right, man. Tell me all about yourself, your roots, your personal life, your childhood dreams...
...You got brothers and sisters? What about your dad? Tell me about your dad! What was he like? Physically?
I didn't have a dad... never saw him...
Hey Stud we gotta...
Korben my man what's happening here?
We have just walked into what is probably the most beautiful concert hall in the universe.
...And over there is Roy Von Bacon, the king of laserball and the best paid player in the League.
...And over there is the Emperor Kodar Japhet whose daughter Aachen is still at the bar.
Ladies and gentlemen, I think we're being...
They're hideous. They've got a crest on the head, the eyes of a toad and fingers all over their hands. Totally hideous!
Don't you think we'd better be going?
Korben man... These dudes are going to waste us if we don't do what they say.
Got it...
This is amazing! Korben, Korben Dallas, the winner of the Gemini Croquette contest just killed three warriors like he was swatting flies...
It's Roy von Bacon, the Lions center forward joining in the battle...
GET OFF MY BACK!
...And our man Korben has literally knocked out the opposition with an amazing 90 foot pitch.
He's on vacation.
Korben man... what the hell is this?
And, uh, what're these numbers clicking by?
You're just saying that to scare me! Right?
Maybe we oughta be going, what do you think?
Like D-Man, I hate to bother you but uh, like, we're down to 2 minutes here...
Hey! What are you doing? The bomb!
Like Korben, can I have 30 seconds of your time here?
Are you nuts, Father? That hurts! I can't feel my teeth.
You know how to fly this thing?
I don't even know what I'm looking for!
Dear listeners, your favorite DJ is alive and kicking. It's seven o'clock and time for the news. Tune in tomorrow for another adventure.
The best show I ever did!
What is this some kinda game? Like chess?
I'm looking, I'm looking.
...we'll never make it.
It... it moved! Korben! Korben!
Nothing! Swear to God, I didn't do nothing!
I was like this... With my hands here and...
Yeah... then I sighed... like this.
I don't have a light.  I stopped smoking last week! If we'd come a bit sooner...
This guy is a killer with the babes.
End of transmission.
Beep. End of transmission.

We're going to take off soon, Mr. Rhod!

Landing gear secure.  Let's light one up.

Liftoff.

Mr. Shadow on the line.

Yes, Sir!

...Not far, now.

Money is of no importance...
...I can't wait to be among you.
Welcome to Paradise.
Here's some champagne. I'll drop by after the concert to open it.
If you don't have the code you can't open it!
The Diva's ship is coming in.
Yes. Sir!
Hello, I'm head of security.
...make yourselves at home safely.
Thanks for your help.
I want maximum security.
OK, let's hear it.
...You open the door. There's a cabby with a girl in his arms.
What happened?
Yeah... A 5 foot 7 inch bomb...
...to who?
What?
Yeah!?
She's allergic to flowers!!!
Did you check out his registration number?
Put him in the docking garage and inform the police.
It's not only advancing, but it's moving at incredible speed! We're having trouble following it.
I have it.
They were waiting for us! It was an ambush!
Hey, you! With the others!
Everyone down!
Don't worry.  This is my fate...
You're a good man...
The Fifth Element...
Yes, and more than that... You must give her the Stones, she's the only one who knows how to use them.
She needs you. She needs your help and your love. She's more fragile than she seems...
She was taught to love the life of others...
Do you love her?
I don't have time... I need to know.
I would like to have died in peace...
They are... with me...
Stay calm and nobody will get hurt!
All this is terribly exciting, hmmm?
He wants the balls! You deaf or something?
I'd say about thirty yards to the left.
Where'd he learn to negotiate like that?
More trouble?
